title: Show minds logo in top
Add open on tap to compose options
Error in boosts without boosted_guid
Bug: New User must give birthdate (mobile version)
description: We need to implement the same fix for the age verification confusion that's on front

title: Where do we want to put the logout link
description:
We're shipping with the new settings panel with the logout link on the top level of settings

![image](/uploads/29d2d008ac8ef6c9b218134fa9d6ccdc/image.png)

This is just to confirm that's where we want it.

title: Enable push notifications for vote/downvotes if user has turned on
description:
If a user has push notifications turned on for votes, then they should receive push notifications for upvotes and downvotes.

From Emi:

"any of these that didn't come thru aren't upvotes or downvotes? because these (if I recall correctly) are filtered out from push notifs"

Yep, still here - https://gitlab.com/minds/engine/-/blob/master/Core/Notification/Extensions/Push.php#L39-41"

title: Add support for title in Activity
Fix to banner
Add remind support to compose
Issue with gifs in new compose with iOS
description: The new image picker doesn't return the mime for the gifs

title: Add gallery picker option to compose
Update image/video picker package
Minds.com embeds not working internally on app.
description:
### Summary
Embedded minds links in conversations are not working on the app

### Steps to reproduce

Tap on one of the lichens links within the app 
https://www.minds.com/media/1084598221388861440

### Platform information

Android version 9

### App version
4.0.1

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Embedded Minds links in conversations on minds don't work

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Links should work

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![broken_links](/uploads/f480bf0c08c568cadaa5c72677d93e52/broken_links.mp4)

title: QA Review of Mobile Analytics
Onboarding contine just spins on IOS 4.0.1
description:
Create a new account on 4.0.1
Go through onboarding
On the Info page, both skip this step and continue 
Don't provide any information
Click continue
A spinner appears on the button, but nothing happens

Also, the "No thanks I'll do it later" is both hard to tap on and very laggy

title: Add remote action for post
Deleting a pose causes double errors
description:
Create a post from Home.
Delete a post.
Click ok on the delete confirmation
You'll get a "Sorry, it looks like there was an error."
Then you'll "Success, Entity removed successfull" 

- [ ] Make sure the post gets deleted successfully
- [ ] Get rid of the "Sorry..." error
- [ ] Remove the "Success!" message and just update the feed view so the entity gets removed

title: Use a remote action for my channel save
Compose should be default mobile screen
description:
When the user opens the app from a cold state, open compose by default


When the user swipes left from compose, go to discovery screen
When the user swipes left from home screen, compose
When the user swipes left from discovery, open home
 
When the user swipes right from compose, go to the home screen
When the user swipes right from home, go to the discovery screen
When the user swipes right from discovery, open compose

@ottman @jotto141 Added a proposal some basic swipe cyclical nav to the screens above. The app opens to compose by default and the those three screens provide swipe navigation, following snap chats basic feel.

title: Nav button behavior
description:
After tapping avatar for nav, if you tap it again it should go to channel.

Tapping notif bell or discovery icon or home should refresh page

title: Logo should refresh feed on tap
description: When you click on the minds logo on the top nav, refresh the currently displayed feed (same as pulling down to trigger the refresh)

title: If you post a Minds channel URL into a status, you can not access the link when tapping on mobile
description:
Go to Curryhobo in the search

In the mobile app, find this post https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1080733175478611968

It refers to his own channel on minds, but clicking it takes you nowhere. Clicking on our own links should navigate to the content

title: Newsfeed horizontal group bar not updating
description:
When you switch from light mode to dark mode, the app goes back to the home screen. There's a jarring interaction where the groups on the home screen disappear, sometimes don't redraw, the blue notification dots disappear

Switching between light mode and dark mode should display the same state on the groups bar.

title: Hot feed error
description: ![Screenshot_20200308-151257_Minds](/uploads/85d3dbbe4c873d63cb254923ef3a7351/Screenshot_20200308-151257_Minds.jpg)

title: Unable to download images from posts
description:
User reports that on iOS, they cannot download media from posts.

REF: https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1083099023124189184

On IOS
Go to a media post
Hold on the image
When you get the "Download to Gallery" prompt, click yes.
You'll get an error downloading file

title: Chill on caps. Improve all error messages
description:
![Screenshot_20200305-200608_Minds](/uploads/9da78e98ccbe7cf234af615d47e6e124/Screenshot_20200305-200608_Minds.jpg)

With as many specifics as possible. Ideally an action to resolve

title: Cannot vote on blogs from discovery
description:
![Screenshot_20200308-122807_Minds](/uploads/7f4b6e490fb422a892ed3e366371b4fc/Screenshot_20200308-122807_Minds.jpg)

I cannot verify this. When I vote on a blog in discovery, it works.

Note, @ottman has really weak signal strength in this screen shot.

Let's make this a bigger card to improve our bad connectivity error handling.
https://www.natashatherobot.com/simulate-bad-network-ios-simulator/

With bad network, make sure we're handling errors
- [ ] Make sure we're handling timeout errors with a "Poor network connection. Please, try again later."

title: Remind errors but reminds anyway
description:
This is very confusing to user because when you go to a channel From a reminded post on your channel and then try to remind one of their new posts it shoots an error but still posts to your feed ![Screenshot_20200306-205353_Minds](/uploads/0f24663850e65f8965e290dea7d532cc/Screenshot_20200306-205353_Minds.jpg)

I was able to remind successfully without error from a reminded channel, but we need to make sure that we're handling errors coming out of reminds when we have bad network connectivity.

title: Cannot edit post
description:
![Screenshot_20200306-204422_Minds](/uploads/880bd2ba83701a19c922b24879781fc4/Screenshot_20200306-204422_Minds.jpg)

Was this tested?

I am able to edit a post @ottman. We'll verify that we can edit the post and add some graceful error handling around bad network connectivity.

- [ ] Make sure we can edit a post
- [ ] Make sure have a "Poor connection. Please, try again later" error handling for bad connectivity.

title: After post, i am directed away from my post
description:
This one is a little subtle.

On the app, scroll down the newsfeed.
Post a new activity
It should scroll, but to the wrong post (it scrolls back to some arbitrary post in the feed)

title: Global error handling for 403 in read only mode
description:
This is our email verification trap. We need to handle our error messaging consistently.

When this error comes back from a write response, redisplay the blue email verification banner

title: Discovery images disappear
description: If you tap over a tile and scroll in the feed view and then return to the main discovery screen some images are not rendered

title: Increase timeout duration on discovery requests
description:
### Summary

Hot/All discovery feed takes more than 10 seconds to load causing the request to always fail on iOS which has a shorter timeout.

### Steps to reproduce

1. On an iOS device perform a discovery request for Hot/All

### Platform information

iOS, also ocasionally Android

### App version

4.0.0 rc3

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Primary Hot/All request times out consistently on iOS making that discovery feed not usable.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Feed should load even if it takes a long time (15 secs)

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/04ec06453635c07681d0bf54feec516c/image.png)

description:
Subscriptions and Subscribers should be links to lists of those channels.

Tag sidebar needs dark theme work.

title: Implement image and video capture logic for new compose
Implement image confirmation on new compose
Implement embed preview and logic on new compose
Theme switcher color
Region outside of text goes to post view
description: On tapping a post in a feed outside of the text area it should go to the post view.

title: on tap hashtags search selects but does not direct to discovery
description:
### Summary

tapping on a hash tag will update discovery setting but not trigger new search

### Steps to reproduce

1. Find a post with a hashtag reference in text
2. tap hashtag reference (seemingly nothing will happen)
3. tap comment button (or other link) to go to a subview
4. hit the back button, discovery search for hashtag will trigger

### Platform information

Samsung Galaxy 9, Android 9

### App version

4.0.0

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

hashtag discovery search is setup on hashtag tap but does not fire

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

hashtag discover feed should load on hashtag tap

### Screenshots

![tag_issue](/uploads/fcf0d009e614b0983003f3a5497e3abd/tag_issue.mp4)

title: Create a camera component with flash and camera switcher
Increase link area for notifications
description:
Tapping anywhere on a notification should trigger reference link. Increase area of link box on all notification templates.

milestone.title: 2020::Rollout
milestone.description:
This sprint aims to cleanup the remaining tasks and issues found during the Canary test phase.

**Goals**
- [ ] Remove the canary feature flag
- [ ] Complete remaining UX work

### App version

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

No error or dialogue with useful information for the user.

```
...
(32 additional frame(s) were not displayed)
```

title: Notification issues on 4.0.0 RC 1
description:
@ottman reported issues with notifications:

Notifications are still not directing properly to subcomments

Especially 2 layers down

I tap a notif and go back to notif list I lose my spot

title: Issues with the 4.0.0 RC 1 Test Release
description:
List of quick changes from the team's QA review. Bigger issues in separate and linked cards

- [x] get rid of Home text on top of newsfeed and put a minds icon (centered)

- [x] fix white lines between posts in dark mode should be way darker

- [x] should be able to access subscription lists directly from nav screen. Make the subscribers count on the main nav screen a link that will take them to the same page as if they went under their channel and clicked their subscriber list.

- [x] help and support and refer friends should not be on top of nav not. those should be in settings

- [x] wallet icon wrong

- [x] boost icon and wallet icon are backwards

- [x] ditch square green buttons they look out of place. All buttons should be replaced with blue text hyperlinks on light mode. Need to confirm the text button color for dark mode. Confirming with Michael

- [x] logout should only be in settings and should be at bottom of list

- [x] text cut off in push notifications settings on top

- [X] log only errors setting means nothing to anyone (this is getting fixed in the new designs and moved to a developer tools panel in the new settings, nothing to fix here)

- [x] remove the left handed mode activity entirely

- [x] dark mode switcher should really move to the main nav screen in the bottom (in the menu)

- [x] there's a gray background behind the filters on my channel in light mode that shouldn't be there

- [x] the lines between notifications in light mode are way too dark

- [x]  the gallery, photo and video buttons in soon to be legacy composer should not be gray background

- [x] the buttons in blocked channels have the same square button issue. the post button in the composer with the oval make more sense for now until we bring in the new designs everywhere

- [X] be able to swipe out of the nav screen and leave a bit of open space on the far right side. Moving this one to a separate card so we can setup nav properly

- [x] Reply count skewed

title: Minor theme color fixes in components
description:
* [x]  Messenger search bar should use the theme color
* [x]  Boost button in activities should use theme colors (no white background in dark theme)
* [x]  Small improvement in navigator

title: Uploading a video throws a white screen error on the latest 4.0.0 test build
description:
On an ipad

Open a new post with + button on the main screen
Try to upload a video from the camera roll
White screen crash every time

Also, when you delete a post from the feed, there's a really ugly double error message

![IMG_0017](/uploads/82296377538705b37bea2af30eca72d6/IMG_0017.MOV)

This is the home for all our various settings and anything not in the design

On the account menu
https://design.minds.com/hosted/mobile/michael/mobile%231689-settings/#artboard2

We're adding this same setting on front https://www.minds.com/settings/general (mature content)

title: Implement the new security screen
description:
Under accounts
We don't have mocks for the actual security screens, so we're going to need to use our best judgement adapting the TFA.

Settings on web has the design and endpoints for killing all existing sessions. 

We should also bring over the nav for Regenerate Messenger Keys and Delete blockchain keychain 

https://design.minds.com/hosted/mobile/michael/mobile%231689-settings/#artboard9

- [ ] Implement 2fa settings
- [ ] Implement the close all sessions functionality from front settings
- [ ] Move over existing security features to the new security tab
- [ ] Light mode
- [ ] Dark mode
- [ ] Unit Tests
- [ ] E2E Tests

title: Leaving and rejoining a gathering results in a weird gray overlay that you can't get rid of
description:
On android for 4.0.0

If you join a gathering
Leave it
And rejoin

You will see the attached gray overlay that you can't get rid of.

This does not open happen on ios

title: Can't set password after invalid password on wallet onboarding
description:
When onboarding wallet on android 4.0.0

Setup a new wallet
When it goes to the keyphrase step, enter an invalid password under six characters with no special characters
Now try to unlock it with a real password
The error message does not go away and you're blocked from continuing

title: Uploading an attached photo blocks onboarding
description:
On android 4.0.0 test apk

Create a new user
Go through the onboarding
Upload a profile photo by selecting from the camera roll
When you try to continue, the "avatar is uploading" message blocks both skip and continue

Wiring Tokens
description:
### Summary

Cannot wire tokens to another user

### Steps to reproduce

1. Go to a channel profile.
2. Attempt to wire tokens
3. Confirm you wish to wire tokens, when you push the send
Nothing will happen

### Platform information

Android

### App version

4.0.0 Test2

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Wiring transaction does not complete

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Wiring transactions should work

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

description: Animated images are not animated in full view.

title: Metrics dark background in light theme
Search Bar Search uses name field instead of username field
description:
### Summary

Channel search searches `name` field instead of `username` field. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Use quick search bar
2. Search for `Ben Hayward`
3. Search for `nemofin`

### Platform information

Android

### App version

4.0.0

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

channel search finds by `name` field

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

channel search should use `username` like web app or ideally search both `username` and `name` fields.

title: Image full view crashing app
description:
### Summary

Tap on a posted image, crashes the app.

### Steps to reproduce

Go to any feed and tap on a posted image. App crashes.

### Platform information

Android 9, mobile portrait

### App version

4.0.0 Test Build

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

App crashes when trying to view a full image 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Image should load

title: Clean up unused code in group view store
New post are not prepended to the groups feed
New posts are not prepended to the feed
